abxaware 0.0.0.9000

  • Reference

    abxaware

    The goal of abxaware is to help aggregating and plotting antibiotic usage data in accordance with the WHO AWaRe classification easy.

    Installation

    You can install the development version from GitHub with:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("anhoej/abxaware", 
                         build_vignettes = TRUE)

    Go to https://anhoej.github.io/abxaware/ for further information.

    Example

    To create a plot of antibiotic use in Danish hospitals from the included dataset abx_sales run this:

    library(abxaware)

awr_plot(abx_sales,
         atc, 
         ddd, 
         time = month, 
         unit = region, 
         ncol = 1)
#> Aggregating data using the "dk" AWaRe classification
